hicpp-member-init.description:
Description

This check is an alias for
cppcoreguidelines-pro-type-member-init
.
Implements the check for
rule 12.4.2
to initialize class members in the right order.
hicpp-member-init.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
